item.title: What is and next in AR?
item.description: Virtual reality promises to immerse you in a simulated reality. It takes you to a space and tries to make you believe you’re actually there. Augmented reality is almost exactly the opposite. It wants to keep you in your world, but it also wants to act as a layer between you and your world. In short, it’s technology that augments your world by layering graphs and images and video on top of it.
